message: Hello Bob, I'm offering this product to you at a special price of $14,000. I think it will be incredibly valuable to you, and I want to give you the first opportunity to own it.
Hello Alice, thank you for the offer. I understand the value of the product, but I am only able to pay up to $12,000 for it. Would you consider adjusting your price?
Bob, I appreciate your offer, but $14,000 is already a very competitive price for this product. How about we meet in the middle at $13,000?
Hello Alice, I appreciate your willingness to negotiate. However, I am still unable to pay more than $12,000 for the product. Would you consider reducing the price further?
